name: Mobile Capital Partners
tag_list: mobile, investment, capital, funding, venture, incubator
overview:
Mobile is a private investment firm which originates, structures and acts as lead investors in early stage, sprout capital, and growth capital financings.

With in-depth industry knowledge, processes for improving and growing businesses, and a strong culture committed to teamwork, Mobile Capital Partners drives value for both our investors and portfolio companies.

Mobile Capital Partners continues to establish new strategies that leverage the power of intellectual capital in our business. Presently, our areas of investment focus are concentrated on social, mobile, and emerging media.
